section.11: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Abu Dharr used to say about a person who makes the intention of Hajj but he repeal it for the ‘Umrah (that will not be valid). This cancellation of hajj for ‘Umrah was specially meant for the people who accompanied the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ)
